question.title: spring UriComponents tobuilder to UriComponentsBuilder
question.body:
It seems Spring has two classes to represent URLs efficiently, UriComponentsBuilder and UriComponents.

UriComponentsBuilder builder = UriComponentsBuilder.fromUriString("https://stackoverflow.com");
UriComponents components = builder.build();

// reverse
UriComponentsBuilder builder2 = components...?

Why is there no method to create a builder from UriComponents efficiently, like toBuilder() for modification? As an example it seems both use MultiValueMap<String, String> queryParams to store all query params internally, but if I try to indirectly create UriComponentsBuilder from UriComponents by going via String or URI, this means the parameters have to be serialized and then parsed again.

answers.body:
A UriComponentsBuilder is a builder/factory for a UriComponents object. They aren't 2 classes to represent URLs that is only the UriComponentsBuilder.

However you can do something like this. UriComponentsBuilder.newInstance().uriComponents(components).
